issue.title: [CF 241] New Condition:Cooldown/Buff/Debuff Compare
issue.body:
Current spell cooldown,buff/debuff duration conditions only compare with numeric.
Sometimes we need compare two spells cooldown or buffs/debuffs duration.

Example:

  1. Cooldown Compare: (Paladin) Show a icon when cooldown for judgement is less than crusader strike.
  2. Buff/Debuff Duration Compare: many, many, many.........-.-(Forgive my laziness)

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #241 | Raw
